name: Space Quest 4: Time Dilation (itch)
description:
You are a lone traveler fighting off an army of evil space villains. Fight through wave after wave of enemy to reach the main battleships and destroy the evil armada once and for all!
Menu theme - Into the Light
Boss theme - Andrew Huang
Battle Theme 2 - Magic Sword (go by their album!)
This game is a demo of a full game I will be developing over the coming months.
